Question: Shenzhen Lighkeep Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen CESP Co., Ltd

Explosion-Proof LED Lights

- Patented products for harsh and hazardous environments
- UL and CUL certified hazardous location LED lighting fixtures
- Expanded product line to include portable explosion-proof lighting and industrial lighting
- Patented explosion-proof hand lamp with structural excellence and optimal illumination
- Reliable LED driver with over 90% efficiency and a lifespan exceeding 50,000 hours
- Hazardous location compliance with Ex d Type classification for Zone 1 and Zone 21
- Committed to becoming a world-class & total solution provider for hazardous location lighting
Summary_cn:
深圳市CECP有限公司

防爆LED灯

- 用于恶劣和危险环境的专利产品
- UL和CUL认证危险场所LED照明器具
- 扩大产品线，包括便携式防爆照明和工业照明
- 专利防爆手电筒，具有结构优异和光照效果最佳
- 可靠的LED驱动器，效率超过90％，寿命超过50,000小时
- 符合Ex d类型分类的危险区域1和区域21的要求
- 致力于成为世界一流的危险场所照明综合解决方案提供商
